ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to make shipping address mandatory when creating a new account in Poland
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK( ShippingCity ), ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingState ), ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode)) && (RecordType.Id ="012a0000001NZsU" || RecordType.Id ="012a0000001NZsV")
